titles.title: VA Enrollment Act
To amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for the expansion of eligibility for veteran reimbursement for emergency treatment provided in non-Department of Veterans Affairs facilities.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care

bill.summary: 3/22/2012--Introduced. VA Enrollment Act - Includes among veterans eligible to receive reimbursement from the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) for emergency treatment services provided in a non-VA facility those who enroll in the VA health care system within 30 days after receiving such emergency treatment.
